member.name: T:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper
member.summary: AutoItLeeHelper was initially designed for PC “roll out” situations to reliably automate and configure thousands of PCs.

member.name: M:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper.#ctor
member.summary: passing instance of AutoITLee to base

member.name: M:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper.MouseClick(AutoItLee.CommonEnum.MouseClick,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Will automate the actual mouse click
member.param: Option to select Left or Right click
How many mouse click to perform

member.name: M:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper.ControlFocus(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: a handle to the requested window.
member.param: The title/hWnd/class of the window to check.
The text of the window to check. Default is an empty string.

member.name: M:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper.WinWaitActive(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: wait until the target windows control activate
member.param: The title/hWnd/class of the window to check.
The text of the window to check. Default is an empty string.
Timeout in seconds if the window is not active. Default is 0 (no timeout).

member.name: M:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper.WinClose(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The title/hWnd/class of the window to check.
[optional] The text of the window to close. Default is an empty string.

member.name: M:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper.WinActivate(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The title/hWnd/class of the window to activate.
[optional] The text of the window to activate. Default is an empty string.

member.name: M:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Sends keystrokes to the active application.
member.param: The string of keystrokes to send.

member.name: M:AutoItLee.AutoItLeeHelper.WinSetState(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows, hides, minimizes, maximizes, or restores a window.
member.param: The title/hWnd/class of the window to change the state.
The text of the window to change the state.
